StatusScreenDay00Objective00.text: November 18, 1990: Evening|Help the customers in your store.| Use the A button to interact.||Press A to confirm a choice.|Press B to cancel a dialog.

StatusScreenDay01Objective01.text: November 23, 1990: Day|Report back on what you heard.

StatusScreenDay01Objective02.text: November 23, 1990: Night|Where did that guy go?

StatusScreenDay02Objective00.text: December 4, 1990: Day|Talk to employees who|have worked at the mall a while.

StatusScreenDay02Objective01.text: December 4, 1990: Day|Report back on what you heard.

StatusScreenDay02Objective02.text: December 4, 1990: Day|Stop by Nut Shack on your way out.

StatusScreenDay02Objective03.text: December 4, 1990: Night|Investigate the camping section|at Fish or Cut Bait.

StatusScreenDay03Objective02.text: December 16, 1990: Day|Report back at your store.

StatusScreenDay03Objective03.text: December 16, 1990: Night|Where did you that guy before?

StatusScreenDay04Objective00.text: December 20, 1990: Evening|Something is up at the arcade.

StatusScreenDay04Objective01.text: December 20, 1990: Evening|Wait for your ride at the usual spot.

StatusScreenDay05Objective00.text: December 24, 1990: Day|Refer shoppers to your store.

StatusScreenDay05Objective01.text: December 24, 1990: Day|See who won the contest.

StatusScreenDay06Objective00.text: December 31, 1990: Morning|Don't forget your going away gift.

StatusScreenDay06Objective01.text: December 31, 1990: Afternoon|It's your last day at Bayhurst.|Say goodbye to all the friends you made.
